title: SOAP notes in 90 seconds: a practical clinic workflow
author: BISTEC Care Team

content.text: SOAP notes are not just documentation — they are how a clinic stays consistent across doctors, shifts and future follow-ups.

items: S: Capture the patient’s story in a sentence.
O: Add quick observations & uploaded documents.
A: Summarize the working diagnosis (or key findings).
P: Record treatment and next steps in bullet points.

content.text: Use templates, dropdowns and structured fields. The best workflow is the one that doctors can complete without thinking.
Consistency creates quality — and quality reduces repeat work.
